summary.body: We are in the process of buying a flat and would welcome any reccommendations for a solicitor to handle the conveyancing procedures
summary.subject: Solicitors

summary.body: Does anyone have any recommendations for solicitors - prefereably local - to speak to about making my will?   Although I don't think my circumstances / requirements are anything out of the ordinary, they require something more than a DIY will from WHSmith.
summary.subject: Solicitor / Making a will
